title: Dwell Gastrobar - temporarily closed
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Organic, Western, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available.  An ecological bar/restaurant uses ingredients from local farms and the interior is made from recycled material. Cozy and Middle Eastern inspired. Half of the menu is vegan and is clearly marked as such; try the tacos and the coconut pie. TEMPORARILY CLOSED FROM MAY TO LATE SUMMER 2016.
